entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
